sermons.title: What Child Is This? The Benedictus
sermons.description: J. Glyn Owen speaks on the wonderful words of Zacharias that the Lord has come to redeem the people. The beginning of light is shining in the advent season, John the Baptist is showing the way to our Saviour.  The Benedictus was the song of thanksgiving uttered by Zechariah on the occasion of the circumcision of his son, John the Baptist.
